Name: Splash
About the game: Splash is a third-person splash damage based action RPG. In it, you play the role of an alchemist scouring the lands for materials to create more potions. Your journey will take you to exotic locations as you fight off hordes of monsters preventing you from reaching your objective.
Meta Title: Splash: Nov 1, 2020, Team Cursed Image and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Splash? Check out the release date (Nov 1, 2020), developer insights from Team Cursed Image, and a complete game summary.
